document_data.mainbody:
'''''The Chaos Curse''''' is the fifth and final book of [[The Cleric Quintet]] by [[R.A. Salvatore]].

{{quote|''The quest is over. The hero returns home.''

''A weary [[Cadderly]] makes his way back to the [[Edificant Library]], where he can begin to rebuild his shattered life. But the [[Chaos Curse]] has one last surprise for him.''

''If he fails to meet the challenge, his beloved [[Danica Maupoissant|Danica]] will be lost to him forever.''}}
